revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=RT-N54U |revision= |asin= |series=AC1200 |est_release_date=02/2015 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=MSQ-RTN54U |ic_id=3568A-RTN54U |pcb_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7620A |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7620A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7612E |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux;3.0; |tp_firmware=Padavan (+ac) |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid=ASUS,ASUS_5G |default_ssid_regex=^ASUS$,,,^ASUS_5G$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Wireless-N600 Dual-Band USB Router}} :[https://www.asus.com/Networks/Wireless_Routers/RTN54U/ Product page] *[http://www.asus.com/event/networks_3G4G_support/ Supported 3G/4G dongles] ===Specifications=== * Product Segment: N600 (300+300 Mbps) * Antenna: 2x external detachable antennas * Operating Frequency: 2.4/5 GHz * Power Supply: external adapter : AC Input : 110~240V (50/60Hz) : DC Output : 12V with max. 1A current * Dimensions 189 x 129 x 36 mm (WxDxH) ===Forum threads=== *[http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:62022-86#3003 On '''iXBT''' forums] (''{{TPFirmware|Padavan}}, RTN'' posts) :[[ASUS RT-AC54U]] = [[ASUS RT-N54U]] + 2T2R 802.11ac !! ==== [https://github.com/RMerl/asuswrt-merlin/blob/master/release/src/router/rc/sysdeps/init-ralink.c RMerlin's Github] ==== {{SCollapse|config â€¢ >> |
	#ifdef RTCONFIG_RALINK
	#include 
	#include 
	#endif
 
	#if defined(RTAC52U) || defined(RTAC51U) 
	|| defined(RTN65U) || defined(RTN56U) 
	|| defined(RTN54U) || defined(RTN14U) 
	|| defined(RTN11P) 
 
	switch(model) {
	case MODEL_RTN11P: /* fall through */
	case MODEL_RTN14U: /* fall through */
	case MODEL_RTN54U: /* fall through */
	case MODEL_RTAC51U: /* fall through */
	case MODEL_RTAC52U:
	nvram_unset("vlan3hwname");
	if ((wans_cap && wanslan_cap) ||
	(wanslan_cap && (!nvram_match("switch_wantag", "none") 
	&& !nvram_match("switch_wantag", ""))))
	nvram_set("vlan3hwname", "et0");
	break;
	}
 
	switch (model) {
	case MODEL_RTN11P: /* fall through */
	case MODEL_RTN14U: /* fall through */
	case MODEL_RTN36U3: /* fall through */
	case MODEL_RTN65U: /* fall through */
	case MODEL_RTN54U:
	case MODEL_RTAC51U: /* fall through */
	case MODEL_RTAC52U: /* fall through */
	merge_wan_port_into_lan_ports = 1;
	break;
	default:
	merge_wan_port_into_lan_ports = 0;
	}
}} ===See also=== *[[List of Padavan firmware supported devices]] *[http://www.asus.com/event/2014/network/ASUS_AC_family_chart/solutions.html Asus Wireless AC networking solutions] __NOTOC__
